title: Emailsend: Activación automática
description: Business Automation Workflow uses 2 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks and ensuring consistent data flow. Integra con Emailsend.

title: Emailsend: Activación automática (Workflow avanzado - 16 pasos)
description: Automatización que se activa cuando ocurren eventos en Emailsend y integra 5 servicios, realiza 5 tipos de acciones.
